show_title: Muted Mics & Mongolian Camels—A Very Monday Monday: GM Farcaster ep287 with cohost @burrrrrberry
text:
29 Seconds of Farcaster ... What did you miss this weekend?

* @tldr released Bracky 2.0 with trading on Twitter, LIve NFL games, & a new mini app! Won't be surprised when Bracky is alongside FanDuel & Draft Kings

* Interesting opportunity with /clankermon & cast collectibles--two auctions are ending today: @garrett a /clankermon starter kit of 3 mons-current bid $37 ending about 6 PM EST https://farcaster.xyz/garrett/0x0c7aace7 & @olystuart has a DEGEN clankermon at $640 ending about 2PM EST https://farcaster.xyz/olystuart/0x71551df4

* In other news, NOBODY cares about decentralization with one notable exception that EVERYBODY cares about decentralization 🤷‍♂️ 

* Interesting share from @deployer on how easy it is to bridge to other chains with @bnkr https://farcaster.xyz/deployer/0x8840c2e5

* @cassie was busy this weekend with lots of Qulibrium; this might be the place to start https://farcaster.xyz/cassie/0x355260a3

* In final round up news: @bertwurst.eth survived abandonment from the Assistants with a sleepover at Uncle Pierre's & @dwr shared a FC mission statement: "Build a credibly neutral decentralized protocol used by 1 billion plus people every day." 

* /gmfarcaster is West-Coast friendly at 11:30 AM EST/ 8:30 PST with Adrienne gone, couldn't think of a betr fill in than @burr.eth joining @nounishprof for all your purple news to start the week 💜

cast.text:
GM Farcaster back tomorrow at a west coast friendly 11:30 am ET/8:30 am PT with @burr.eth filling in for the vacationing @adrienne.  Join @burr.eth and I on YouTube for the most active chat or watch on Twitter or in the GMFC mini app! See you in the GM!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W3I39UdVVNc
https://farcaster.xyz/miniapps/RWk7UVoMf6vW/gm-farcaster

show_title: Muted Mics & Mongolian Camels—A Very Monday Monday: GM Farcaster ep287 with cohost @burrrrrberry
text:
surest sign of a scam lately is a slick app that appears fully formed out of nowhere promising you free money. don't let them run this rug playbook.

https://farcaster.xyz/horsefacts.eth/0xf9c1f65c

cast.text:
High-risk project alert: @farlegacy just launched a token $SHARD , and the dev quickly sold after launch, cashing out over $30K.

They seem like a very experienced team, building a card miniapp around Base memecoins, driving viral growth through referral link sharing, and previously attempting to sell NFTs. Now they’ve issued a token to pull people in and then quickly rug. 

Looking closely, the scam was obvious from the start. Always stay alert in crypto!
average crypto mf: "I can't believe they just invented free lunches and they're gonna give one to ME!!"

Top 60 got another +10

show_title: Muted Mics & Mongolian Camels—A Very Monday Monday: GM Farcaster ep287 with cohost @burrrrrberry
text:
Back to class Monday and this is a thread for my students - they'll be reviewing 3 mini apps and I'm creating a thread with a some to start with to make it easier. Students will need to review one from each of the following categories and post in the discussion on Canvas:

✅ crypto integration (at least an nft mint or some kind of integration)
✅ utility/productivity/educational
✅ gaming

Cast one of your reviews in this /fgcu for extra credit and crypto tips!
 
Use the mini app explore page to find many many more apps or see the other recommendations from other Farcasters at the end of this thread.

Starting with gaming since there's a lot! First group here are general gaming mini apps.

🎮 /remix previously known as /farcade - the TikTok of gaming
🎮 /farville tend your crops (Farcaster verson of Farmville)
🎮 /clankermon gotta clank 'em all
🎮 Perfect shot 

max number I can share is 4 so continuing 🧵 in replies 

https://farcaster.xyz/miniapps/70JYaQHoZSlz/remix 
https://farcaster.xyz/miniapps/WoLihpyQDh7w/farville 
https://farcaster.xyz/miniapps/RssPhFeD24W_/clankermon 
https://farcaster.xyz/miniapps/Ger7p7BjfrAs/perfect-shot

show_title: Muted Mics & Mongolian Camels—A Very Monday Monday: GM Farcaster ep287 with cohost @burrrrrberry
text:
What’s at the top of your movie faves? 🍿 Kiddo has been making an effort to watch older/classic/award-winning movies and has a running list of his favorites that he has watched or rewatched in the past year. 

🎥 We just rewatched Good Will Hunting and he confirmed it’s #1 placement. (My list would be different but this would be in my top 10 at least) 

When he started this a while back, Top Gun Maverick was at the top of this list. Lots of progress made. He also has a running list of movies he has yet to watch.

text:
Clankermon Mint Update 

In the final strech of the launch mint - 389 remaining

For the remaining mints, we're slightly bumping the mint price, reducing the player discount we launched with and are raising the mint cap to 10

Later this week, as we reopen onboarding with some changes we will remove the cap entirely as we work to add the in app marketplace for secondary trading

Thanks for supporting the mons ❤️

show_title: Muted Mics & Mongolian Camels—A Very Monday Monday: GM Farcaster ep287 with cohost @burrrrrberry
text:
Announcing: The First Ever Degen Mon Public Auction!
**This cast is a live auction for Degen mon #10131. Bid on this cast to bid on the degen mon. Subject to reserve price, winning bid will win the degen mon. Details below**
[NOTE: I started this on another cast yesterday but was advised to change it from a reply auction to a cast auction. Updated to this cast with agreement from the existing bidder.]
$Degen mon is very rare in $Clankermon, with a roughly 0.5% drop rate. There have been only eight revealed so far in 1,855 mons (based on opensea data). I pulled two of those out of my 20 mons revealed, I've been playing clankermon since release.
Reserve price: 0.15 ETH. You may bid below that but at the end if the reserve has not been met I will decide whether or not to take the top bid or keep the degen mon. If the reserve has been met I will honor the top bid.
Rules are determined by the cast auction mechanism.
If the winner is someone who knows me we can work out transfer arrangements, we can always use a trusted third party if needed, we can discuss this in DM if you want. I've run many auctions for rare magic cards and haven't had a problem.
(Video is a degen mon render from @matthewfox animated using Seedance 1.0 Pro on nightcafe. Feel free to use it.)

text:
🚨Eggman virus infection report

horsensefacts @horsefacts.eth 

You have developed Eggman virus infection!
Eggman virus is a scary infection that turns PFP into Eggman when infected.

You are a secondary infection from @stevedv.eth .
You were infected when you volunteered to be infected in his infection report.

Unfortunately, there is no vaccine or cure.
The Eggman virus is highly contagious, so please be careful. 
Who wants to be infected? 😈
If anyone wants to be infected, please reply here.
